metadata.title: USN-6217-1 -- .NET vulnerability
metadata.description: McKee-Harris, Matt Cotterell, and Jack Moran discovered that .NET did not properly update account lockout maximum failed attempts. An attacker could possibly use this issue to bypass the security feature and attempt to guess more passwords for an account.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-6217-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  aspnetcore-runtime-6.0 - 6.0.120-0ubuntu1~22.04.1 aspnetcore-targeting-pack-6.0 - 6.0.120-0ubuntu1~22.04.1 dotnet-apphost-pack-6.0 - 6.0.120-0ubuntu1~22.04.1 dotnet-host - 6.0.120-0ubuntu1~22.04.1 dotnet-hostfxr-6.0 - 6.0.120-0ubuntu1~22.04.1 dotnet-runtime-6.0 - 6.0.120-0ubuntu1~22.04.1 dotnet-sdk-6.0 - 6.0.120-0ubuntu1~22.04.1 dotnet-sdk-6.0-source-built-artifacts - 6.0.120-0ubuntu1~22.04.1 dotnet-targeting-pack-6.0 - 6.0.120-0ubuntu1~22.04.1 dotnet-templates-6.0 - 6.0.120-0ubuntu1~22.04.1 dotnet6 - 6.0.120-0ubuntu1~22.04.1 netstandard-targeting-pack-2.1 - 6.0.120-0ubuntu1~22.04.1 No subscription required  aspnetcore-runtime-7.0 - 7.0.109-0ubuntu1~22.04.1 aspnetcore-targeting-pack-7.0 - 7.0.109-0ubuntu1~22.04.1 dotnet-apphost-pack-7.0 - 7.0.109-0ubuntu1~22.04.1 dotnet-host-7.0 - 7.0.109-0ubuntu1~22.04.1 dotnet-hostfxr-7.0 - 7.0.109-0ubuntu1~22.04.1 dotnet-runtime-7.0 - 7.0.109-0ubuntu1~22.04.1 dotnet-sdk-7.0 - 7.0.109-0ubuntu1~22.04.1 dotnet-sdk-7.0-source-built-artifacts - 7.0.109-0ubuntu1~22.04.1 dotnet-targeting-pack-7.0 - 7.0.109-0ubuntu1~22.04.1 dotnet-templates-7.0 - 7.0.109-0ubuntu1~22.04.1 dotnet7 - 7.0.109-0ubuntu1~22.04.1 netstandard-targeting-pack-2.1-7.0 - 7.0.109-0ubuntu1~22.04.1 No subscription required
